roleset.name: hoping to perform better than the other guy

example.name: arg0
example.text: Just as an experiment to begin with , but I am fairly competititive in spirit , so if one of my teams makes it to the Super Bowl - I 'll watch it instead of the Andy Griffith show marathon and eat me some chicken wings and drink a beer or two .

example.name: all args
example.text: [Doug's younger sister]-1 had become [*-1] competitive with him over the family dog, pulling Pete out of Doug's seven-year-old arms and yanking him so hard he turned on Doug and bit him hard on his thigh.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, compete-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls battle-36.4-1.
